title: Evansville Residents March For Energy Savings and Justice (Sierra Club)
text: ( Source : Sierra Club ) EVANSVILLE - Local students, educators, and community residents today marched in Downtown Evansville to urge Vectren to reduce energy waste and lower energy costs for local families, residents and small businesses. The
